Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I am confident it will be an excellent investment for you. Considering its worth to you, I am offering this exceptional item to you for $12,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features that make this product stand out. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
